## Using `pacman` package:

The function `p_load()` checks if a package is installed, if not , it installs the package and then loads it.

```{r}

# install.packages("pacman")

pacman::p_load(ggplot2, tidyr, dplyr)

```


## Using `librarian` package:

The function `shelf()` automatically installs, updates and loads R packages that are not yet installed.

```{r}

# install.packages("librarian")

librarian::shelf(ggplot2)


```
